title: Chesapeake Bay: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       The main office location for the National Park Service Chesapeake Bay is in the neighborhood of Eastport, on Spa Creek, looking towards historic Annapolis, Maryland. Some staff members are stationed in Virginia and in Pennsylvania, and several interns working with partners on Chesapeake Youth Corps workforces and career development are stationed at partners' offices. 410 Severn Avenue Suite 314 Annapolis, MD 21403 Office Hours: Monday - Friday 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. (except major Holidays) General Information:  410-260-2488 Chuck Hunt - Superintendent, 410-260-2471 Jonathan Doherty - Assistant Superintendent, 410-260-2477 Bob Campbell - Chief; Planning and Development 410-260-2478 Suzanne Copping - Resource Protection and Partnerships: 410-260-2476  Abbi Wicklein-Bayne - Chief; Interpretation, Communication, Education: 410-260-2483 Jamie Cupples - Administrative Officer: 410-260-2473 Kate Baker: 410-260-2475 Cindy Chance: 410-260-2492 Amy Handen: 410-260-2493 Wink Hastings: 410-260-2481 Matt Jagunic: 410-260-2482 Mike Land: 410-260-2487 Margaret Markham: 410-260-2494 Kate Marks: 410-260-2480 James Rush: 410-260-2495 Julie Walker: 410-260-2486 Virginia Staff: Deanna Beacham: 804-677-8642 John Davy: 804-749-4472 Christine Lucero: 757-258-8914 Pennsylvania staff: Jackie Kramer: 410-271-8731 Chesapeake Youth Corps Interns: James Chang, National Park Service, Chesapeake Bay Office
